Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Brain Injuries/Pneumocephalus
Record.Description: Presence of air or gas within the intracranial cavity (e.g., epidural space, subdural space, intracerebral, etc.) which may result from traumatic injuries, fistulous tract formation, erosions of the skull from NEOPLASMS or infection, NEUROSURGICAL PROCEDURES, and other conditions.
